resources.string:
About:
 This App works by generating 3 random numbers
 ranging from 0 to 255. These value represent
 the red, green, and blue values that make up
 any color. These value are then converted into
 Hexadecimal and HSV representation.

 How to Use:
 Click the "Generate Random Color" to produce a
 color. To save the hex value to the clipboard,
 select the menu form the top right corner, and
 select save. If you want to remove the text of
 the screen to get a better view of the color,
 press and hold the screen. To return the text,
 tap the screen once.
